issue.title: XML metadata previewer
issue.body:
**Original author :** BRUNET Clément

When we launch an xml Preview of the metadata, the xml content is bad formatted.

A lot of closed tag are at the end of the file.

I don't know exactly how does it generate the preview, but it is very different of the xml saved in the metadata field of the database.


Clément. 

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Preview is based on a tierce API called SyntaxHighlighter.
It seems that there is some bugs inside it when displaying XML content...

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Last stable release of SyntaxHighlighter has fixed such problems and is implemented inside easySDI V4

XML content sample preview in V4...
!preview.png!
